title: Is lux a viable mid?
body:
I feel like she gets super scary if she can get ahead, but a lot of times you end up just being passive and farming because the enemy just picks an assassin regardless if you pick before/after them. 

As a whole I think AP mids have kind of disappeared due to the tank meta. Even staple mids like orianna have been replaced with LB/cho/ekko/ other "OP" champions... 

On a final note.... Lux's rank 5 E costs more than her ult by 30 mana.... wtf is up with that? Her E is one of the more vital parts of her kit... why have it cost that much? It leaves her OOM in lane if she uses it more than once every few minutes. Why should a champion specializing in ranged harrass be so gated by the exact thing that should make her strong?
